itemDescription: British swimmer, Commonwealth Games gold medallist

wikipedia_page.main: Daniel Wallace (born 14 April 1993) is a retired Scottish swimmer who has represented Great Britain in the Olympic Games and FINA world championships, and Scotland in the Commonwealth Games.  The 2014 Commonwealth Games champion at 400 metre individual medley, he was part of the Great Britain 4 x 200 metre freestyle relay team that won gold at the 2015 FINA World Aquatics Championships, and silver at the same event at the 2016 Summer Olympics.

response: * Daniel Wallace (politician) (1801–1859), U.S. Congressman from South Carolina
* Daniel Wallace (author) (born 1959), American author of the novel Big Fish
* Daniel Wallace, the plaintiff in Wallace v. International Business Machines Corp. et al., a 2006 lawsuit filed against the GNU General Public License
